ygData.subject: Re: More clues from Lindell, third book confirmed, and more...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I actually agree.  If it were in the water I would guess either the OOT or the other major water zone.  I just wanted to see his reasoning. I just wish i
ygData.messageBody:
Joshua Bednarz wrote:
>
> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> I think I have to agree. Putting a book like that on a super high spawn is
> low, but not even Verant would go that low.
>
> >Michael Ott wrote:
> > >
> > > From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
> > >
> > > the necro is not the way to go neiter is the spelunker...
> > >
> >
> >And you know this how??

I actually agree. If it were in the water I would guess either the OOT
or
the other major water zone. I just wanted to see his reasoning.

I just wish i was one level higher because this would make exploration
so much
easier.

---ralph
